Perceptor::


Perceptor dodged the attacks and fired 10 times against Sidewipe, 10 
against Azure blade and 5 against Maximal City



--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> AzureBlade's fast speed allowed him to dodge the missile easily. He 
> took his rifle in his left hand and fired high velocity bullets at 
> perceptor.
>

> > 
> >

> fired

25
